description.zh-cn: 北宋初年开国将领，后周时期与赵匡胤结为义兄弟。宋朝建立后，参与平定潞州、扬州等战役，后在“杯酒释兵权”事件中被解除兵权。据称其为人“贪婪无厌”，信奉佛教。
description.en: An accomplished general in the early Northern Song dynasty. He became a sworn brother of Zhao Kuangyin during the Later Zhou period. After the founding of the Song dynasty, he participated in campaigns to pacify Luzhou and Yangzhou, and was later relieved of his military command in the 'Dismantling military power with a cup of wine' incident. He was reportedly known for being 'insatiably greedy' and was a devout Buddhist.

description.zh-cn: 北宋开国皇帝，后周将领，通过陈桥兵变建立宋朝。策划了“杯酒释兵权”事件以加强中央集权。
description.en: The founding emperor of the Northern Song dynasty. A general of the Later Zhou, he established the Song dynasty through the Chenqiao Mutiny. He orchestrated the 'Dismantling military power with a cup of wine' incident to centralize power.

description.zh-cn: 石守信的长子。
description.en: The eldest son of Shi Shouxin.

description.zh-cn: 石守信的次子，娶宋太祖次女延庆公主为妻。
description.en: The second son of Shi Shouxin, who married Princess Yanqing, the second daughter of Emperor Taizu of Song.

description.zh-cn: 石守信的幼子，早亡。
description.en: The youngest son of Shi Shouxin, who died young.

description.zh-cn: 宋太祖赵匡胤的次女，嫁给石守信的次子石保吉。
description.en: The second daughter of Emperor Taizu of Song, Zhao Kuangyin. She married Shi Baoji, the second son of Shi Shouxin.

description.zh-cn: 北宋第二位皇帝，宋太祖赵匡胤之弟。
description.en: The second emperor of the Northern Song dynasty, younger brother of Emperor Taizu, Zhao Kuangyin.

description.zh-cn: 五代十国时期的最后一个朝代。
description.en: The last dynasty of the Five Dynasties and Ten Kingdoms period.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上继五代十国之后的朝代。
description.en: A dynasty in Chinese history that followed the Five Dynasties and Ten Kingdoms period.

description.zh-cn: 宋太祖为加强中央集权，通过一场酒宴，以和平方式劝告并解除了石守信等高级将领的兵权。
description.en: An incident where Emperor Taizu of Song, in order to centralize power, persuaded and peacefully stripped high-ranking generals like Shi Shouxin of their military authority during a banquet.

description.zh-cn: 北宋初年高级将领之一，在“杯酒释兵权”事件中被解除兵权。
description.en: One of the high-ranking generals in the early Northern Song dynasty, who was relieved of his military command during the 'Dismantling military power with a cup of wine' incident.

description.zh-cn: 北宋初年高级将领之一，在“杯酒释兵权”事件中被解除兵权。
description.en: One of the high-ranking generals in the early Northern Song dynasty, who was relieved of his military command during the 'Dismantling military power with a cup of wine' incident.

description.zh-cn: 北宋初年高级将领之一，在“杯酒释兵权”事件中被解除兵权。
description.en: One of the high-ranking generals in the early Northern Song dynasty, who was relieved of his military command during the 'Dismantling military power with a cup of wine' incident.

description.zh-cn: 北宋初年高级将领之一，在“杯酒释兵权”事件中被解除兵权。
description.en: One of the high-ranking generals in the early Northern Song dynasty, who was relieved of his military command during the 'Dismantling military power with a cup of wine' incident.

description.zh-cn: 北宋初年高级将领之一，在“杯酒释兵权”事件中被解除兵权。
description.en: One of the high-ranking generals in the early Northern Song dynasty, who was relieved of his military command during the 'Dismantling military power with a cup of wine' incident.

description.zh-cn: 后周及宋初的军事官职，节度使是唐末、五代至宋初掌握地方军政大权的职位。
description.en: A military official title during the Later Zhou and early Song dynasties. A Jiedushi (military commissioner) held significant regional military and administrative power from the late Tang through the Five Dynasties to the early Song.

nodes.id: 侍卫亲军马步都指挥使

zh-cn: 侍卫亲军马步都指挥使

description.zh-cn: 北宋初年禁军高级指挥官的职位。
description.en: A high-ranking commander position of the imperial guards in the early Northern Song dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 北宋的军事官职，驻扎于郓州。
description.en: A military official title in the Northern Song dynasty, stationed in Yunzhou.

description.zh-cn: 北宋的军事官职，驻扎于陈州。
description.en: A military official title in the Northern Song dynasty, stationed in Chenzhou.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代的重要官职，通常为宰相之首。
description.en: An important official position in ancient China, often the head of the chancellery.

description.zh-cn: 一幅描绘宋太祖赵匡胤与大臣们一同踢球的画作，由元代画家钱选摹仿北宋画家苏汉臣所作。
description.en: A painting depicting Emperor Taizu of Song, Zhao Kuangyin, playing Cuju (an ancient form of football) with his ministers. It was created by the Yuan dynasty painter Qian Xuan, imitating a work by the Northern Song painter Su Hanchen.

description.zh-cn: 元代画家。
description.en: A painter of the Yuan dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 北宋宫廷画家。
description.en: A court painter of the Northern Song dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 北宋初年宰相，宋太祖的重要谋臣。
description.en: A chancellor in the early Northern Song dynasty and a key advisor to Emperor Taizu of Song.

description.zh-cn: 北宋初年将领。
description.en: A general in the early Northern Song dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 北宋初年大臣。
description.en: A minister in the early Northern Song dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 世界三大宗教之一。
description.en: One of the world's three major religions.

description.zh-cn: 由石守信在洛邑（今洛阳）建造的佛教寺庙。
description.en: A Buddhist temple built by Shi Shouxin in Luoyi (modern Luoyang).

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国历史学者。
description.en: A historian from the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 石守信在后周时期与赵匡胤结义为兄弟。
description.en: Shi Shouxin became a sworn brother of Zhao Kuangyin during the Later Zhou period.

description.zh-cn: 在后周及北宋初年，石守信是赵匡胤的部下将领。
description.en: During the Later Zhou and early Northern Song dynasties, Shi Shouxin was a subordinate general to Zhao Kuangyin.

description.zh-cn: 石守信于太平兴国四年（979年）随宋太宗征讨辽国。
description.en: In 979 (the 4th year of the Taiping Xingguo era), Shi Shouxin followed Emperor Taizong of Song on a campaign against the Liao dynasty.

relationships.target: 侍卫亲军马步都指挥使

description.zh-cn: 宋太祖为加强中央集权，策划并实施了“杯酒释兵权”。
description.en: Emperor Taizu of Song planned and executed the 'Dismantling military power with a cup of wine' to centralize power.

description.zh-cn: 在“杯酒释兵权”事件中被解除兵权，改授天平军节度使。
description.en: Was relieved of his military command during the 'Dismantling military power with a cup of wine' incident and was reassigned as the Jiedushi of Tianping Army.

description.zh-cn: 在“杯酒释兵权”事件中被解除兵权。
description.en: Was relieved of his military command during the 'Dismantling military power with a cup of wine' incident.

description.zh-cn: 在“杯酒释兵权”事件中被解除兵权。
description.en: Was relieved of his military command during the 'Dismantling military power with a cup of wine' incident.

description.zh-cn: 在“杯酒释兵权”事件中被解除兵权。
description.en: Was relieved of his military command during the 'Dismantling military power with a cup of wine' incident.

description.zh-cn: 在“杯酒释兵权”事件中被解除兵权。
description.en: Was relieved of his military command during the 'Dismantling military power with a cup of wine' incident.

description.zh-cn: 在“杯酒释兵权”事件中被解除兵权。
description.en: Was relieved of his military command during the 'Dismantling military power with a cup of wine' incident.

description.zh-cn: 石守信信奉释教（佛教）。
description.en: Shi Shouxin was a follower of Shijiao (Buddhism).

description.zh-cn: 石守信在洛邑（今洛阳）建造了崇德寺。
description.en: Shi Shouxin built the Chongde Temple in Luoyi (modern Luoyang).

description.zh-cn: 钱选摹仿苏汉臣的作品，创作了《宋太祖蹴鞠图》。
description.en: Qian Xuan created 'Emperor Taizu Playing Cuju' by imitating a work by Su Hanchen.

description.zh-cn: 钱选的《宋太祖蹴鞠图》是摹仿苏汉臣的作品。
description.en: Qian Xuan's 'Emperor Taizu Playing Cuju' is an imitation of a work by Su Hanchen.

description.zh-cn: 《宋太祖蹴鞠图》描绘了石守信与宋太祖等人一同踢球的场景。
description.en: The painting 'Emperor Taizu Playing Cuju' depicts a scene of Shi Shouxin playing Cuju with Emperor Taizu and others.

description.zh-cn: 学者邓小南认为石守信可能有粟特人血统，为沙陀族。
description.en: Scholar Deng Xiaonan believes that Shi Shouxin may have had Sogdian ancestry and belonged to the Shatuo people.
